findings.issue: GDP impact calculation assumes all labor hours contribute equally to GDP, ignoring productivity differences
Dividing by negative 1B instead of positive 1B creates confusing double negative

errorDetails.raw:
[FINDING]
Category: mathematical_accuracy
Severity: minor
Line: 46
Quote: "incomeEffect = inputs.incomeElasticity * (inputs.ubiAmount / (inputs.avgWage * inputs.baseWorkHours))"
Issue: Formula uses wage*hours as denominator but doesn't account for existing non-wage income
[/FINDING]
